segments.text: My eyes are fixed on that open cabinet, specifically the "COOKIE JAR."
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are truly audacious, going for the forbidden sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching incredibly far, his hand already in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a flash of fear as I see the stool wobbling beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little accomplice, the girl, is waiting patiently below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, clearly expecting her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me happy to see such a determined effort for something so simple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I'm also angry that they are being so sneaky and possibly dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of their covert operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic scene of childhood mischief playing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised by their bravery in attempting this right behind the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those freshly baked cookies just looking at the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so close to achieving their sugary goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they don't come crashing down with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
